Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to certain contracts for the Buffalo Sewer Authority
Summary: Specifies a time frame for the award of contracts with costs exceeding five hundred thousand dollars; grants authority to the general manager of the authority to designate certain contracts as small business set-asides; establishes procedures related thereto.
LawCode: Amd ยง1181, add ยง1181-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to certain contracts for the Buffalo Sewer Authority
